title: NHS England service evaluation and audit - results
publisher: Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health
description: Run by NHS England, this aims to provide important up-to-date information on the clinical aspects of COVID-19 while also determining the care needs of children admitted to hospital with COVID-19.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll down to Results click on the download data link under each chart
sizingNotes: 6 simple csv tables it should be possible t combine all data into one dataset
